column5: Went  to a trib with some friends.  Non existent morning bite, slow action all day.  Finicky fish resulted in careful presentation.  Kept 20" for the pan, lost a bunch, released both.  nice buck   PB 29" female   wicked day to be out and about fishing for trout.
Congrats on the PB hen!  I didn't know there were steelhead in space...  LOL  Mike
Beautiful lady you've got there! Nice job

I know that spot.  Ill be there with 50 of my friends and their white buckets in the morning.  Really nice fish, but does anyone else think that the background thing is getting out of hand? I know if I catch a trout Im gonna post the picture with the background. Hell Ill even tell you where I caught it, because the Oshawa Creek isnt exactly a secret.  Unless you fish a small, or relativley unknown trib, in which case disregard all above.
Nice fish i bet that trout tasted good.    jordan
